resources.string:
We are a team of intrepid programming students in our senior year of college looking to make a lasting impact with our creativity and resolve.
This app represents the culmination of our learning of simple Android development and the dedication to making a system that can be useful for everyone.
We hope that you find it helpful to your needs, lives up to your expectations, and sincerely thank you for downloading and giving us a chance! 

– Sobhan, Dylan, and Miguel
First use the camera button to take a new picture of a document or use the gallery button to select an image that you have saved in your phone’s gallery.

Once you have your image, the app will automatically guide you in the next steps.\nSelect your crop (otherwise use the autocrop)\nSelect your filter before saving it to the app interface. Return to the home screen.

Image now in the screen, you can:
Convert to PDF and save the file directly to your phone.
Select your image and find tag words relating to your scan. 
Clear the image tag text from your home screen.
In the menu share your image with another app.
Enjoy your scan!\nThank you for choosing DocScan
